name: jetpack-cli
description: Zero-config developer onboarding orchestrator using GitHub Copilot CLI

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:rollback
scripts.test:unit: node tests/doc-generator.test.js && node tests/manifest-parser.test.js && node tests/manifest-fetcher.test.js && node tests/copilot-troubleshooter.test.js && node tests/copilot-resolver.test.js && node tests/manifest-generator.test.js
scripts.test:integration: node tests/integration-docs.test.js && node tests/integration-setup.test.js && node tests/integration-verification.test.js
scripts.test:rollback: node tests/rollback/rollback-state.test.js && node tests/rollback/rollback-validator.test.js && node tests/rollback/rollback-actions.test.js && node tests/rollback/rollback-diff-generator.test.js && node tests/rollback/rollback-orchestrator.test.js && node tests/rollback/copilot-risk-analyzer.test.js
